column4: okay, shorter now: in Ubuntu Server 9.10, what is responsible for updating the /etc/motd file? Is there a cron script? Daemon? I can't find it.
Take a look at the manpage for motd.tail, it explains the process.
it seems like it is running more frequently than just on boot. for instance, the available updates keeps updating. i see there are scripts under /etc/update-motd.d/ but i don't know what runs them
